claim: PlayStation 4 does not emphasize integration with other devices and services.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The PlayStation 4 places an increased emphasis on social interaction and integration with other devices and services , including the ability to play games off-console on PlayStation Vita and other supported devices  (  `` Remote Play ''  )  , the ability to stream gameplay online or to friends , with them controlling gameplay remotely  (  `` Share Play ''  )  .
